item.description:
Every now and then I throw a purely social house party for all of my meetup groups to mingle, dance and enjoy stimulating conversation. They are a great chance to cross-pollinate and meet a lot of different people. They have been a big hit....and I've had a lot of requests to do them more often. So we are going to try every 4-6 weeks and see what happens. :)

Bring friends, significant others!! For those of you that are single – wear a sticker on your badge to show your interest in meeting other singles. Join us for some great company, stimulating conversation and maybe even some groovy moves!

Also a great low risk way to meet others from the group if you haven't yet been to an event...

We are lucky to have DJ Alkemi (also a great financial planner!) providing the tunes for the night. He's open to requests!

Please Bring:

1). $10 per person to contribute towards the expenses of the night. You are welcome to pay at door, and its appreciated if you can prepay to help with the cash flow!

2.) Something share such as appetizer or dessert and/or bring your own beer or wine. Please do not bring any hard liquor.  Your contributions are very appreciated!! (If you are unable to contribute for financial reasons please come anyway.) :)

Loose Schedule:

Conversation, Networking, General Schmoozing: 7:30pm

Dancing and General Merriment: 8:30 to 12am

Hanging out: 12am til….

Hope you can make it!

Feel free to call 413-320-3991 or email me at trish@trishblain.com if you have any questions.  Feel free to bring friends or significant others!!!

Trish
item.name: Spring Multi-Meetup House Party
